[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2 Days workshop in LinkedIn Marketing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594453380631{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Topics will be Covered:
• Profile vs Page
• InMail Campaigns
• Paid Campaigns
• Lead Generation
• B2B Sales

Read more


Support:
1. 5 days of email support available to answer the queries.
2. Consultancy Services available (charged separately).
3. The course will be interactive with Q&A slot included.

Payment Terms:
1. Advance Payment. Once the payment is done will not be refunded.
2. In case you miss the lecture will reschedule as per the next available slot.
